Name: One-pot Creamy Garlic Chicken and Rice
Recipe: 1) Slice the chicken breast into chunks, and mix it with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
2) Heat olive oil in a skillet pan over medium heat. Add chicken breast and fry until browned, about 3 minutes.
3) Mince the garlic gloves, add it to the skillet pan, and fry for 30 more seconds.
4) Add rice and chicken broth. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer, and cover with lid. Cook for 20 minutes, stirring regularly.
5) Remove pan from heat and place baby spinach on top of the rice. Cover and let sit for 5 minutes.
6) Remove lid and stir well. Stir in cream and serve.

Name: Greek Yoghurt with Berries and Granola
Recipe: 1) Pour Greek yogurt into a bowl, add protein powder and mix well.
2) Add granola, fresh blueberries and halved strawberries.

Name: Rice Cakes with Peanut Butter and Chocolate
Recipe: 1) Spread peanut butter, either smooth or crunchy, on rice cakes.
2) Melt chocolate in a bowl in microwave oven.
3) Pour the melted chocolate over the rice cakes. Store in the freezer for 10 minutes.
